title: International Trade and Investment All-Party Parliamentary Group
purpose: The APPG will strengthen Parliament’s ability to address global trade complexities, foster cross-party collaboration, engage industry stakeholders, and promote strategic investment opportunities. This essential forum aims to shape and enhance the UK’s trade and investment landscape, driving economic growth and ensuring long-term global competitiveness.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 3000.
contact_details.secretariat: NorthPoint Strategy and Chartered Institute of Export & International Trade jointly act as the group's secretariat.https://www.northpointstrategy.co.uk/andhttps://www.export.org.uk/
